title: Memes and Games, thank you.
body:
Laughing Fish
Malicious Metal
~~Ship~~Raptorkarr
Ralanr
Any random meme hero that steps up to the plate.

Thank you.

Laughing Fish, you ushered in a new age of Memes and Games that brought these Boards to a new level of community. Anybody with a sense of humor can appreciate a joke or a meme, and could make even the harshest days just a little bit better. I personally have had a good chuckle on my worst days when on these Boards. Thank you.

Malicious Metal? Mordekaiser is the most famoust and meme-able champion now thanks to you. You brought metal to the Boards like no band has ever brought to the genre, and have kept this community iron-clad and steeled for anything. You have made us a proud nation.

Raptorkarr, we may have had our battles, but you are officially the most anime memer ever. That is an honor I can only dream of. Thank you for doing your best to dig through the bowels of Deviantart and Google images to find us quality content, and thank you for making the Boards a bit more interesting with your shipping and drama. It's been awesome.

Ralanr, my brother-in-shields, speak for all tank mains. Your contributions to Sionce were great and revolutionary, and you will never be forgotten. Also, we still need to play a game together.

And for all those wonderful people my tiny pea-brain can't remember... thank you. From the bottom of my heart. These Boards are my home on the internet, and it warms my heart to see how much we've grown together as a community and will continue to share our unique brands of humor with one another.

And to the downvote trolls, thank you. Whether you downvote this or not, remember that someone out there loves you. And I will give you a friendly hug if you allow me to. And I know that trolling may be your own brand of sadistic humor. But hey, it's humor.

I await this post's burial.

replies.body: https://i.ytimg.com/vi/tfOUwfS1Lm8/maxresdefault.jpg
Noticed.
https://media.giphy.com/media/kdeXw36FQvvXi/giphy.gif
*Nods and teleports away.*

Oh god, are you dying?

Edit: Ok that was probably an extreme question to ask, but this seemed pretty sudden. 

And we should play sometime. I'm not gonna be on till the weekend though.

I won't be on for the next 2 months, so no worries.

Also, I dunno. Might be dying, not that I know of. As far as I know (and hope), I am alive and well and memeing on.

I just wanted to take a moment to appreciate what we are.

EDIT: (Also because Laughing Fish and Raptorkarr's scuffle, I was scared this family would break apart)

"We all die, why not choose how?"
(Deathsinger intensifies)

''I died but I ate oranges http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/9/9c/Remove_Scurvy.png/revision/latest?cb=20150707190028&format=webp and now it's k.''

*Lives on in Pirate*
"Death is certain, but it doesn't have to be ugly."

> [{quoted}](name=Skelenth,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Ab1tibRY,comment-id=0000000000000002,timestamp=2016-06-15T20:44:59.917+0000)
>
> "Death is certain, but **killing** doesn't have to be ugly."

{{champion:202}} : Only perfection is acceptable.
I adapted it to the situation. We weren't talking about killing anyone.. I hope
the less you know, the better.
I wish you luck in those next two months.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Ab1tibRY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-15T14:00:37.578+0000)

I would also like to thank Ralanr. He has shown me the path to true tanking. 

"Somebody has to guard the stupid people"

{{champion:268}} I SHALL HELP THIS ADORABLE VOID CREATURE WITH HIS SAND FORTRESS. I SHALL PROVIDE THE FIRST UPVOTE.
https://espngrantland.files.wordpress.com/2015/07/tumblr_m9j7j95oq01qzeg2so2_250.gif

Meanwhile...

{{champion:81}} NO...nooo....
{{champion:82}} Hue hue, it's true you know. I am your hue-ther.

http://cdn.ymaservices.com/editorial_service/media/images/000/030/476/original/drunk_no_4_replace.gif.gif?1404168370

I'm new to the memeing madness, and I hope I don't make a fool of myself.

May your teammates always Stand United, and may your rivers run red, Melledoneus.

This board is utter Insanity, you can't make a fool of yourself unless you do something really stupid. 

Oh... And let me know if I can ever assist you with this red river thing you got going on

It goes like this

http://25.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m6k1dmFu7i1qci4ejo1_r2_250.gif

Results in this

http://i.imgur.com/kIszf5H.gif

And makes your enemies do this

https://media.giphy.com/media/ps9U95h4TxRza/giphy.gif

Just follow those steps.

Nah, go ahead and make a fool of yourself. It is what the rest of us do.
http://images5.fanpop.com/image/photos/29900000/We-all-go-a-little-mad-sometimes-biggerstaff-family-29906614-482-240.gif

We should Queue some time.
Especially now that I got a NA account and am still level 4
You're my Shenpai on NA :^)
What's your NA account name?!
I think he actually got his hands (gloves?) on Malicious Metal for NA, because Fish actually had it claimed for him.

Nope, I got a far more menacing name, one to send shivers down mortal spines, one to make my enemies tremble in their boots.

I
AM
Delicious Metal!
{{champion:35}}  <- Most Shivers NA
I am going to be honest, when I took the name I intended to pretend to be him on the boards and see how long it would take anyone to notice. But then I decided against that.

How dare you!
Nobody can imitate me, I'm just this weird mix of snarky responses, way too macabre humor and a hefty amount of sarcasm.

All topped off with METAL.

I think he could do it
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Missed opportunity lol.
did you get the FEK avatar the same and everything, otherwise it'd be pretty obvious to those enlightened among us who have FEK.

I assume you're going to have mastery ~~5~~ 7 mordekaiser on NA in no time.

Because the metal is the mightiest.

######I think I'm trying too hard.
Try harder, you're going places.

"Any random meme hero"

I will pretend you mean me.

*cries in corner*

http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/thehungergamesrp/images/b/b0/Harry-potter-who-are-you.gif/revision/latest?cb=20150615000238

http://66.media.tumblr.com/9be0268082698ea47e85ef908a2a1067/tumblr_ms9hp10bxE1sgl0ajo1_500.gif
https://m.popkey.co/81ec18/qdo1G.gif
Except that anyone could've done what these guys did. Most people just have less time or don't care as much about dedication to the Boards. But eh..okay then.

You're right, anyone could. 

Anyone can speak in defense of a champion (Being right is different). Anyone can make jokes, or discuss tactics or lore. 

We're just players and people. A community if you will.
But the difference is they DID. They put the time and effort to, and it's even more significant because anybody could hve done it, but they answered the call.

The boards wouldn't be NEARLY as awesome of a place to be without y'all.

https://media0.giphy.com/media/FmBhzktIjvdZe/200.gif

I salute you, known memers and not-so-known-memers.

> [{quoted}](name=Tidal Tyrant,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Ab1tibRY,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2016-06-15T16:56:27.920+0000)
> 
> I salute you, known memers and **not-so-known-memers.**

Thank you.
TuT

Here's something for you, catch!

https://media1.giphy.com/media/EWxGJCQowrlao/200w_d.gif

http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/675/809/06a.gif

Much obliged.
One day, I'll be a meme lord. But for now, I shall work as a meme serf.
I dub thee, meme knight.
Meme's & Games is the best part of these boards.
This is not a meme or a game, I do not comprehend.

This is all a game.

This is a meme.

Meow.
I almost thought you were leaving. Don't scare me man
